Patrick Chukwuka Onyejiaka (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị na asaa n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2000), onye a maara dịka Patrick Chuka ma ọ bụ ArtistChuka, bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke jị icheku ọkụ na pen ballpoint na-arụ oru
Ọ na-ejikwa mmanụ, pastel na acrylic ese ihe, na-elekwasị anya na nka ya na eziokwu na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke hyperrealism.
A mụrụ Chuka na Victoria Island, Lagos Steeti n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ anọ, ebe ọ bụ nwa mbụ
Ọ bụ onye Abba, Nwangele, Imo State, Nigeria
N'ihi nsogbu ezinụlọ mgbe ọ na-etolite, ezinụlọ ya kwagara ọtụtụ ebe, na-amanye ya ịgbanwe site n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gaa na nke ọzọ

Site na 2010 ruo 2011, ọ gara Federal Government College, Odogbolu, Ogun State, Nigeria maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ kwagara Top Highflyer College, Isolo, Lagos State, site na 2012 ruo 2014, tupu ọ kwaga ọzọ na Weenoble International School, Ejigbo, Lagos State, ebe o mechara gụchaa na 2015
Ọ malitere ime nka mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Chuka mechara kwaga United States ya na ezinụlọ ya na 2018. Ugbu a, ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Berkeley City College, Berkeley, California, USA, ebe ọ na-amụ Biology.
Chuka jị icheku ọkụ na pen ballpoint arụ ọrụ
Ọ na-ese ihe na mmanụ, pastel, acrylic ma na-akpụ ihe
Ọ dọọrọ uche gaa n'isiokwu ndị na-aga n'ihu dịka feminism, ikike alụmdi na nwunye maka ndị na-eto eto, ikike LGBTQ na ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na nka ya.
N'afọ 2018, ọ kọwara ihe mere o ji ewe iwe mgbe ọ na-agụ Bible
Ọ katọrọ Solomọn maka ịrịọ Chineke maka Amamihe.
Na 16 Jenụwarị 2018, Chuka nwere eserese ya a gụnyere na Brittle Paper na "14: An Anthology of Queer Art, Vol
N'abalị iri atọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba, e gosipụtara Patrick na BBC.
